ref: 5043 chidrá ʻ torn asunder ʼ RV., ʻ having holes, pierced ʼ KātyŚr., ʻ leaky ʼ MBh., n. ʻ slit, cleft, hole ʼ VS. [~ *chilla -- 1. -- √chid]
MIA. chidda -- and chiḍḍa -- , both of which have been affected by nasal of pres. st. *chindati and vowel of chēda -- &c. and which in their turn cross with saṁdhí -- .
